org.springframework.integration.dsl

Class CorrelationHandlerSpec<S extends CorrelationHandlerSpec<S,H>,H extends org.springframework.integration.aggregator.AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.IntegrationComponentSpec<S,Tuple2<F,H>>
      • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.EndpointSpec<S,org.springframework.integration.config.ConsumerEndpointFactoryBean,H>
        • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.ConsumerEndpointSpec<S,H>
          • org.springframework.integration.dsl.CorrelationHandlerSpec<S,H>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the target CorrelationHandlerSpec implementation type.
    H - the AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler implementation type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<Tuple2<org.springframework.integration.config.ConsumerEndpointFactoryBean,H>>, ComponentsRegistration
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregatorSpec, ResequencerSpec

    public abstract class CorrelationHandlerSpec<S extends CorrelationHandlerSpec<S,H>,H extends org.springframework.integration.aggregator.AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler>
extends ConsumerEndpointSpec<S,H>
    A MessageHandlerSpec for an AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler.
    Author:
    Artem Bilan

      • groupTimeout

        public S groupTimeout(Function<org.springframework.integration.store.MessageGroup,java.lang.Long> groupTimeoutFunction)
        Configure the handler with a function that will be invoked to resolve the group timeout, based on the message group. Usually used with a JDK8 lambda:

        .groupTimeout(g -> g.size() * 2000L).

        Parameters:
        groupTimeoutFunction - a function invoked to resolve the group timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the handler spec.
        See Also:
        AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler.setGroupTimeoutExpression(org.springframework.expression.Expression)

      • processor

        public S processor(java.lang.Object target)
        Configure the handler with MethodInvokingCorrelationStrategy and MethodInvokingReleaseStrategy using the target object which should have methods annotated appropriately for each function.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the handler spec.
        See Also:
        AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler.setCorrelationStrategy(CorrelationStrategy), AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler.setReleaseStrategy(ReleaseStrategy)

      • expireGroupsUponTimeout

        public S expireGroupsUponTimeout(boolean expireGroupsUponTimeout)
        Expire (completely remove) a group if it is completed due to timeout. Default true for aggregator and false for resequencer.
        Parameters:
        expireGroupsUponTimeout - the expireGroupsUponTimeout to set
        Returns:
        the handler spec.
        Since:
        1.1
        See Also:
        AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler.setExpireGroupsUponTimeout(boolean)

      • forceReleaseAdvice

        public S forceReleaseAdvice(org.aopalliance.aop.Advice... advice)
        Configure a list of Advice objects to be applied to the forceComplete() operation.
        Parameters:
        advice - the advice chain.
        Returns:
        the endpoint spec.
        Since:
        1.1

      • lockRegistry

        public S lockRegistry(org.springframework.integration.support.locks.LockRegistry lockRegistry)
        Used to obtain a Lock based on the groupId for concurrent operations on the MessageGroup. By default, an internal DefaultLockRegistry is used. Use of a distributed LockRegistry, such as the RedisLockRegistry, ensures only one instance of the aggregator will operate on a group concurrently.
        Parameters:
        lockRegistry - the LockRegistry to use.
        Returns:
        the endpoint spec.
        Since:
        1.1
